name: Chùa Phật Tích

name: Làng gốm Phù Lãng
address: Làng gốm Phù Lãng, Bắc Ninh, Vietnam
description: Phù Lãng Ceramic Village is famous for its traditional pottery and ceramic art, offering visitors the chance to see the crafting process.

name: Đền Đô
address: Đền Đô, Bắc Ninh, Vietnam
description: Đền Đô is a historic temple dedicated to the kings of the Ly Dynasty, showcasing Vietnam's ancient royal heritage.

address: Chùa Dâu, Bắc Ninh, Vietnam

name: Làng tranh Đông Hồ
address: Làng tranh Đông Hồ, Bắc Ninh, Vietnam
description: Dong Ho Village is famous for its traditional folk paintings, which depict the vibrant life of rural Vietnam.

name: Đền Bà Chúa Kho
address: Đền Bà Chúa Kho, Bắc Ninh, Vietnam
description: Bà Chúa Kho Temple is dedicated to the goddess of wealth and prosperity, attracting many visitors who come to pray for good fortune.

name: Làng quan họ Diềm
address: Làng quan họ Diềm, Bắc Ninh, Vietnam
description: Diềm Village is known for its unique Quan Họ singing, a traditional form of folk music recognized by UNESCO.

address: Văn miếu Bắc Ninh, Bắc Ninh, Vietnam
description: The Bac Ninh Literature Temple is dedicated to Confucius and showcases the city's rich history and respect for education.

name: Lăng Kinh Dương Vương
address: Lăng Kinh Dương Vương, Bắc Ninh, Vietnam
description: The Tomb of Kinh Duong Vuong is an important historical site, marking the resting place of the legendary founder of the first Vietnamese dynasty.

address: Đền thờ Lý Thường Kiệt, Bắc Ninh, Vietnam
description: The Lý Thường Kiệt Temple is dedicated to the renowned military general, known for his victory against the Song Dynasty invaders.

address: Chùa Tiêu Sơn, Bắc Ninh, Vietnam
description: Tiêu Sơn Pagoda is a peaceful Buddhist temple located on a hill, offering scenic views and a tranquil atmosphere.
